org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp.topologystore.vm
Class GridTcpDiscoveryVmTopologyStore

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp.topologystore.vm.GridTcpDiscoveryVmTopologyStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStore
public class GridTcpDiscoveryVmTopologyStore
extends Object
implements GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStore

Local JVM-based topology store.

Configuration

There are no configuration parameters.

Constructor Detail

GridTcpDiscoveryVmTopologyStore

public GridTcpDiscoveryVmTopologyStore()
Method Detail

topologyVersion

public long topologyVersion()
Gets current topology version.

Implementation should obtain read lock for store.

Specified by:
topologyVersion in interface GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStore
Returns:
Topology version.

clear

public void clear()
Clears topology and sets current version to 0.

First node in topology (coordinator) should call this method prior to putting itself to store using GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStore.put(GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStoreNode).

Implementation should obtain exclusive write lock for store.

Specified by:
clear in interface GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStore

nodes

public Collection<GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStoreNode> nodes(long minTopVer,
                                                           long maxTopVer)
Gets all nodes with topology version greater, than the first parameter value and less or equal to the second parameter value ordered by topology version. (see GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStoreNode.topologyVersion()).

Implementation should obtain read lock for store.

Specified by:
nodes in interface GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStore
Parameters:
minTopVer - Minimal topology version.
maxTopVer - Max topology version.
Returns:
Nodes having topology version greater, than the first parameter value and less or equal to the second parameter value.

put

public void put(GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStoreNode node)
Puts node to topology store.

Coordinator puts node whenever its state changes.

Implementation should obtain exclusive write lock for store.

Specified by:
put in interface GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStore
Parameters:
node - Node to put.

evict

public void evict(long maxTopVer)
Evicts nodes having topology version less or equal to parameter value.

Coordinator calls this method with the minimal topology version nodes in topology have.

Implementation should obtain exclusive write lock for store.

Specified by:
evict in interface GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStore
Parameters:
maxTopVer - Maximum topology version to evict.

state

@Nullable
public GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStoreNodeState state(UUID id)
                                             throws GridSpiException
Gets actual node state.

Implementation should obtain read lock for store.

Specified by:
state in interface GridTcpDiscoveryTopologyStore
Throws:
GridSpiException - If any error occurs.
Parameters:
id - Node ID.
Returns:
Node state.
